Description: Providing green CO₂ from the open air
Full Description: Carbominer is an ambitious climate tech startup that has developed new technology to capture carbon dioxide from the open air locally. The business model is providing green CO₂ as a service to commercial clients, that aim to transition to sustainable operations. Potential applications include, but are not limited to indoor agriculture, decarbonisation of the construction industry, and carbon removals.  The company offers modular plug-and-play CO₂ Direct Air Capture technology, embedded in transportable 20ft shipping containers. Carbominer's DAC technology stands out due to the ability to use cheap intermittent renewable electricity. Combined with the local capture (no need for liquefaction, storage, transportation, etc.), it opens the path to the lowest cost possible for Direct Air Capture of CO₂
Industry Groups: Agriculture and Farming, Hardware, Manufacturing, Science and Engineering, Sustainability
Top 5 Investors: EIC Accelerator, SMRK VC Fund, Climate Innovation Vouchers

Currently, Reface continues to democratize leading ML technologies and launch new products for content transformation using AI. As of March 2023, the company's portfolio includes the following products: * Reface — a mobile app that allows users to replace faces in videos and photos, voice-over content, and generate AI portraits from multiple selfies. Within 2 years after its launch, Reface has been downloaded 250 million times. * Revive — a mobile app for animating images. It allows users to instantly edit and animate photos, memes, or art portraits. * Memomet — a mobile app for creating Ukrainian memes. *Metahead — a technology for the neural rendering of 3D images based on 2D photos.

MultiNFT places simple to use curated experiences at the centre of its activity with blockchain serving only as an infrastructure whilst partnering with renowned artists/athletes and brands to further increase the adoption and invite fans and more common users. b) The brands - the other side of the equation: Most working brands with fanbase and market share do not want to risk onboarding new avenues such as web3 due to its inherit risk and self education required to safety execute. MultiNFT helps brands, athletes, artists and other projects to utilize and join this new frontier without the need of becoming a blockchain organization. Description: Settle is a creator of an universal mobile application for food chains where customers can select meals and pay online.
Full Description: With Settle, you can pre-order lunch at restaurants, so that your food is ready when you arrive. You dine 60% faster, as you skip waiting for your table, food and check. Settle makes lunch your best time of the day by giving you delicious meals and more time for a real break. For restaurants: 100% prepaid orders and tables, 60% faster turnarounds, new sales online, more effective upselling and more targeted marketing. We focus on popular restaurants in busy areas with breakfast and lunch menu. We offer companies and teams group lunch pre-ordering at restaurants near their offices. In addition to mobile pre-ordering, restaurants can offer specials and happy hours during off-peak time. In Ukraine, we currently take 15-20% commission from restaurants. In the USA, the service will be launched free for restaurants and users. Then we'll try out this model: a small commission on every pre-order for restaurants during off-peak hours and a small fee for users during peak hours.

Industries: Hardware, Mobile, Navigation, Parking, Payments, Software
Description: Find, book and pay for your parking in few clicks
Full Description: Tap4Parking  - parking app to find, book, navigate and pay for your parking just in few clicks all over the Europe.   Tap4Parking provides information on free parking lots in real time mode by converting data from any parking equipment and analyzing video stream in cloud. Camera of own production gives possibility to detect slot availability and identify car number.  With T4P app you can find, navigate and pay for parking in few clicks With T4P app drivers will be able to find free parking  2-3 times faster than ever before, get to them easily using navigation and pay directly from phone. And all that in one app, all over the Europe and on ones native language.   How we are managing that? Tap4Parking gathering actual database of all parking lots in Europe. We integrate main paying parking systems of 28 European countries under one solution. Our engineering team developed soft and hardware for camera enabling to analyze parking occupancy, recognize plate numbers and apart from that - identifying wrongly parked vehicles. In 3 years we see T4P as:    - IoT data standard in parking equipment industry -  partnering with main market players (parking chains, payment systems, navigation systems and car manufactures)  - The universal generator of parking payment tools (integration with main existing payment alternatives for parking  - payment systems, mobile operators)  - Universal parking guide for Europe - all needed information re parking for locals and tourists (detailed guides on prices, conditions for disabled people, parking contact info)  - Represented in main EU countries and integrated main cities (>300K citizens)  - Local opinion makers on parking policy in Ukraine. In 2015 - participants of StarCube Accelerator (Brno, CZ)  - 2nd place ans winners of special price from YSoft.
Industry Groups: Financial Services, Hardware, Mobile, Navigation and Mapping, Payments, Software, Transportation

Description: 2Polyglot is a freelance platform that offers translation, copywriting, tutoring marketplace, and affiliate program services.
Full Description: 2Polyglot is a new website which was created to bring translators, copywriters, guides and tutors into one platform. The main idea of the project is to make freelancing easier and more effective for translators and others who work with foreign languages. Registered users will have four optional tabs (Translator, Copywriter, Guide and Tutor) where they can fill in the boxes with basic info, upload their portfolios with translations, unique texts, photos, certificates and other supporting documents. Copywriters will have an extra SHOP option to upload their unique texts for customers to browse and purchase. For copyright protection, all texts will only have an extract of 30 words available for free browsing. 2Polyglot was created for easy and effective work for both Lingualancers and Customers. The project team has developed very user-friendly website design with handy info boxes. It will take a Customer only 10 seconds to fully browse and evaluate a Lingualancer’s profile. There is also a special SAFE DEAL option created for quality control of orders. All monies will be withheld before Customer’s confirmation of an order completion. In case of a failed order all monies will be reimbursed. 2Polyglot also developed a system of order evaluation and profile ranking. The platform will be a great advantage for young lingualancers who will have a chance to earn high profile rankings under equal conditions with experienced professionals. 2Polyglot will run in English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian, Ukraininan, Polish and Chinese. The platform will keep being free of charge after the launch. The 2Polyglot team includes experienced linguists and translators whose main goal is to create a perfect system for effective work in the translations field.
Industry Groups: Content and Publishing, Education, Professional Services

Full Description: Serpstat is the go-to platform for achieving search marketing goals. With a suite of powerful modules, you can track your performance, analyze your competitors, research keywords and backlinks, audit your website, and more.  Dive deep into keyword research with Serpstat’s extensive keyword database, now bigger than ever with global coverage across 230 countries. Uncover the most valuable keywords for your business, understand search intent, and optimize your content strategy. Our AI-driven insights help you work smarter, not harder. Serpstat's AI can also detect plagiarism, extract relevant keywords, and even generate subtitles for your video content. Identify technical issues, prioritize fixes, and ensure your site is fully optimized for search engines. We support Java Script website rendering and JSON LD markup. Description: HURMA System is a subsidiary and a product by IT Svit.
Full Description: Hurma is the first HRM / HRIS system developed in Ukraine and automates HR processes, recruiting, managing company objectives, and monitoring employee mood and motivation. The mission of Hurma is the application of advanced technologies and HR best practices for automating and optimizing routine HR tasks and increasing the efficiency of employee management. Due to this, the HR brand of the business is improved and expenses for hiring, motivation, and retention of qualified employees are reduced. Our mission is to improve the quality of life and work for HR-managers and employees of any company and organization by digitalizing, optimizing and automating the HR and recruitment processes for all the parties involved. We achieve this by providing  HURMA (HUman Resource MAnagement) System — an end-to-end solution that covers all the basic personnel management needs of any business. Using AI/DL in Hurma System helps both HR specialists and employees spend less time on routine tasks and more on creative work, thus being more motivated, maintaining higher productivity and better work-life balance. With Hurma System, both employees and the HR-department have to spend less time working with papers, Google Spreadsheets and other outdated tech when dealing with HR processes — and can spend more time interacting with each other, improving productivity, bolstering creativity and helping the team to work more efficiently. Hurma optimizes the following HR processes: personnel management, recruiting, staff adaptation, employee motivation and retention, evaluation and certification of personnel, internal training and professional growth, labor legal relations and document circulation, management of OKR for the company, analytics and statistics.   The Hurma system combines our experience and knowledge of the processes of recruiting and HR, modern technologies and approaches embodied in a convenient and high-quality software product. We are constantly exploring new approaches and technologies, integrating them into our system, as well as feedback from Hurma users. This helps us make the Hurma system better!

Our software uses sophisticated language processing algorithms to find social media messages that express an intention to buy a certain product or service. We call these public posts leads, because they help businesses that provide relevant products or services reach out to the author of the message. We sort these leads into several industry categories to simplify the lead discovery process. Datawiz BI is developed for merchandising and marketing professionals, providing science-based pricing, define key driven products, products layout, and promotion modeling to allow retailers to increase profit. Our solution is applied in the retail industry, fmcg, grocery, and drug stores. Datawiz Builder is self-served data visulisation tools. It helps to create customized dashboard and share with your colleagues, clients and partners by one click.  Datawiz Loyalty provides analytics for clients' loyalty program and target communication. Datawiz AI Bot is developed based on NLP and AI tech that answers client's question about their business KPIs. Datawiz Mobile provides you short view of KPIs, reports and actionable suggestion from Datawiz.io platform.

Industries: Apps, Gift Card, Private Social Networking
Description: ActiveGift is an online gift-giving platform using social graphs to help users choose suitable gifts for others.
Full Description: "ActiveGift provides you the freedom to give gifts anonymously. If you want to give someone a gift and do not want to go to a store and buy it, ActiveGift is the online platform to use. Using ActiveGift is a breeze. You can sign up for ActiveGift through your Facebook account. You will get onto the ActiveGift dashboard where you can type details about the recipient. You can also invite mutual friends or contacts to suggest a gift for the recipient. You select the gift from a variety of choices". - StartupTunes "Here’s how it works: Say your birthday, bar mitzvah, or Christmas is coming up. You would sign up for active gifts and let your friends and family know you have an account there. From there your friends would sign up too. After they sign up they would think of gifts they want to get for you. active gift then anonymizes the gift ideas and sends them back to the recipient.  The recipient then gives the gifts a thumbs up or thumbs down. The recipient can thumb up or thumb down multiple gifts so that they don’t automatically know everything they’re going to receive. The gift purchaser then gets informed that the recipient has completed their active gift list and with a push of a button they can purchase the gift right there online.  See insurance that you will never again buy the wrong gift." - http://nibletz.com
Industry Groups: Apps, Commerce and Shopping, Community and Lifestyle, Financial Services, Software
